description.eggroll-tree-enhancer.maxCal: Maximum wait time (ms) for folder size calculation. Calculation will stop and a message will be shown if this time is exceeded. The maximum is 60 seconds.
description.eggroll-tree-enhancer.fileSi: File size calculation base. Choose 1000 (decimal, using KB / MB / GB units) or 1024 (binary, using KiB / MiB / GiB units).
description.eggroll-tree-enhancer.debugM: Enable debug mode. When enabled, detailed extension logs will be output to the console for troubleshooting.
description.eggroll-tree-enhancer.fileTe:
Display template for file hover tooltips. It is recommended to set this in settings.json. Supported placeholders:
- {name}: File name
- {size}: File size with automatic units
- {rawSize}: Raw file size (in bytes)
- {modifiedTime}: Formatted modification time
description.eggroll-tree-enhancer.folder:
Display template for folder hover tooltips. It is recommended to set this in settings.json. Supported placeholders:
- {name}: Folder name
- {size}: Folder size with automatic units
- {rawSize}: Raw folder size (in bytes)
- {fileCount}: Number of child files
- {folderCount}: Number of child folders
- {modifiedTime}: Formatted modification time

Display template for folder calculating state. It is recommended to set this in settings.json. Supported placeholders:
- {name}: Folder name
- {modifiedTime}: Formatted modification time

Display template for folder calculation timeout. It is recommended to set this in settings.json. Supported placeholders:
- {name}: Folder name
- {modifiedTime}: Formatted modification time
- {maxCalculationTime}: Maximum calculation time (ms)
description.eggroll-tree-enhancer.dateTi:
Date and time display format. Supported placeholders:
- YYYY: Four-digit year
- MM: Two-digit month (01-12)
- DD: Two-digit day (01-31)
- HH: Two-digit hour (00-23)
- mm: Two-digit minute (00-59)
- ss: Two-digit second (00-59)
